titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1363) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2011, and for other purposes; and waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-56, by Ms. Foxx.

All points of order against consideration of the bill and the provisions of the bill are waived. The requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII for a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House is waived with respect to any resolution reported before April 11, 2011, providing for consideration or disposition of a measure making or continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2011.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 27.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 206.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 185 (Roll no. 242).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 189 (Roll no. 243).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/6/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1363) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2011, and for other purposes; and waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
